ABOUT.P1: My passion for development was born after I finished university and realized that my job did not fulfill me. I had always liked technology but had never seen it as more than a hobby, until one day, while browsing the internet, I came across my first lines of code. After a couple of console games, I decided to dive in and balance (once again) work and studies.

RETRO_WEBSITE.DESCRIPT: A homage born out of longing. This open-source single page application combines retro design with modern technologies, creating an experience where past and future merge to transport the user back to the arcade era.
